block.peculiars.aloe_cake.description: A refreshing aloe cake! Place it in the world to eat it up to 7 times.
block.peculiars.aloe_ice_cream_block.des: It's frigid and surprisingly resistant to melting. Sweet stuff!
The cauldron is full of a concoction of milk and aloe flavoring.
block.peculiars.passion_fruit_cake.descr: A passion fruit cake bursting with flavor! Place it in the world to eat it up to 7 times. Mind the seeds!
block.peculiars.passion_fruit_ice_cream_: It's frigid and surprisingly resistant to melting. Sweet stuff!
block.peculiars.passion_fruit_milkshake_: The cauldron is full of a concoction of milk and passion fruit flavoring. Mind the seeds!
block.peculiars.yucca_cake.description: A multifaceted yucca cake! Place it in the world to eat it up to 7 times.
block.peculiars.yucca_ice_cream_block.de: It's frigid and surprisingly resistant to melting. Sweet stuff!
block.peculiars.yucca_milkshake_cauldron: The cauldron is full of a concoction of milk and yucca flavoring.
item.peculiars.aloe_ice_cream.descriptio: Refreshingly cold to the touch, not too sweet.
item.peculiars.aloe_jelly_slice.descript: It woobles funkily when you pick it up.
item.peculiars.passion_fruit_ice_cream.d: A creamy ice practically bursting with flavor. Mind the seeds!
item.peculiars.passion_fruit_milkshake.d: A burstingly flavorful beverage. Mind the seeds!
item.peculiars.tropical_salad.descriptio: A varied, tropical platter which refreshes in many ways. Mind the seeds!
item.peculiars.yucca_ice_cream.descripti: The cold is layered with fruity, nutty elements.
